name: BoxButton
description:
The goal of each level is always the same. The shape of each level is always the same. The rules however, are not the same.
Open the door by interacting with the game elements. Play through multiple variations of the same level. Can you adapt to the changing rulesets?

This is a short, silly and somewhat easy game that may push you to think out of the box.

Was built in 2 days for the FSU gamejam https://itch.io/jam/fsu-fall-jam-21

Controls:

  • A & D to move
  • W to jump
  • F to pick up / put down the box
  • R to restart the level
